name: hi-events
description: Hi Events is an open source event management and ticketing system. It lets organizers publish event pages, handle registrations, issue QR tickets and track check ins, while keeping all attendee data on their own server.
features: Event Pages: Create professional event pages with descriptions, schedules, and venue information.
Ticketing System: Sell tickets online with support for multiple ticket types and pricing tiers.
QR Code Tickets: Generate unique QR codes for each ticket for easy check-in.
Check-In Management: Scan tickets at the door with mobile apps or web interface.
Registration Forms: Collect attendee information with customizable registration fields.
Payment Processing: Integrate with payment gateways for secure online transactions.
Attendee Management: View, search, and manage all registered attendees in one place.
Data Ownership: Keep all attendee and sales data on your own server for privacy and control.
